projects: [{"title":"Kidney Disease Classification Deep Learning Project","start_date":"Nov 2023","end_date":"Dec 2023","description":"• Detected the presence of a kidney tumor, by using the axial & coronal scans. Evaluated the performance of severalCNN models thereby achieved a maximum of 85.3% accuracy on validation dataset after hyperparameter tuning• Using Github workflow, deployed CI/CD pipeline by building docker image & publishing it to AWS container"},{"title":"1st Position in Kharagpur Data Science Hackathon 2021 by Redbus","start_date":"Nov 2021","end_date":"Dec 2021","description":"Made a statistical model using conditional probability which predicts fare setter leader from time series data"},{"title":"Case Study on Jindal Stainless Steel","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"This case study is given to my team under Indian Case Challenge 2021 event. This event is a part of Kshitij 2021. This case study on Jindal Stainless Steel(JSL), which addresses & provides solutions for the issues related to the following points:1. Expansion in Retail Segment2. Challenges related to Logistics & Inventory Management 3. Online Sales Development4. Overseas Expansion"},{"title":"Quant Club Sample Website","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"This website is mainly consists of Front End Development through HTML, CSS & SASS.It has nice look, hover effects & background.This website is divided into 6 parts which provides all information about Quant Club, IIT Kharagpur."}]
